clean_data: Network AdministratorImplementation Specialist span lNetworkspan span lAdministratorspanImplementation Specialist NetworkSystems Engineer Portland OR Dedicated to detailed excellence and continuous improvement Authorized to work in the US for any employer Work Experience Network AdministratorImplementation Specialist Interactive Northwest Inc January 2017 to February 2019 Network AdministratorImplementation Specialist Responsible for keeping our network in efficient working order as well as managing ESXi lab and provisioning hosts Each of our 4 lab hosts are used to house virtual machines that our developers use as a platform to develop and test customer applications Additionally our Quality Control team uses these machines to test call flow paths for a customers specific set up Leverage Nessus scanning to find and remediate vulnerabilities on our local network Upgrade ESXi hosts to version 65 from 55 Troubleshoot Networking issues with Cisco gear as well as Red Hat virtual servers Build configure and maintain our lab virtual machines Test hardware before deployment to our local network Assess maintain and repair lab hardware to ensure continuous availability for our team Systems Administrator Farmer Brothers Coffee November 2015 to January 2017 Responsible for all technical needs at the Portland OR roasting and production facility for Farmer Brothers I am responsible for everything that attaches to our network This includes roughly 70 users 11 production lines and a myriad of production related systems Any and all network concerns for the Portland facility run through me including being on call 24 hours a day 5 days a week I began at Farmer Brothers by immediately identifying security concerns and proposing steps to resolve them Audit VLANs for security vulnerabilities Configure networked devices for use on the production floor Upgrade and maintain all systems used at the Portland production facility Program Cisco switches Discover issues with backup system and advise solutions Recommends upgrades patches and new applications and equipment Coordinate and advise outside contractors Systems Administrator West Music Company April 2013 to August 2015 As an integral part of a 3 person IT department I was responsible for securing troubleshooting and maintenance of all networking related systems Additionally I share in the responsibility of managing our corporate infrastructure through programming changes to enterprise level switches namely our HP Procurve 2600s as well as planning and ordering any changes to site routers Telnet in to program access level switches for deployment at all 7 West Music locations Configure VLAN access through firewalls as per the network design Configure VPN sessions to allow users access to our network remotely Allow remote gateway access to our local network through our onsite gateway server Assist in the design of Access Control Lists for use by our ISP on our MPLS Assist in the redesign of our ip subnetting scheme Install professional level network cabling to bring a recently purchased store online Research and propose solutions to how we handle mobile device management Upgrade domain controllers from Server 2003 R2 to Server 2012 R2 Responsible for creating maintaining and enforcing active directory permissions and auditing and documentation of group policies Maintain a network of over 200 users over 400 user accounts and over 300 computers Utilize PowerShell scripting to save time in various administrative tasks including the automation of user additions and deletions Responsible for the management and maintenance of West Music Companys IT infrastructure equipment including over 20 servers both virtual and physical Build maintain and secure our Office 365 intranet and SharePoint site including the migration from our original SharePoint WSS 30 site Work with Microsoft partner to migrate our users to Office 365 Enterprise plans Troubleshoot and document issues pertaining to Microsoft products such as Microsoft Office Suite Troubleshoot networking and software issues via phone and the use of Microsofts Remote Desktop Systems AdministratorRemote Support Specialist Titronics R D Network March 2010 to April 2013 Responsible for securing every aspect of our onsite LAN as well as supporting our products with customers in the field Design and implement the Local Area Network topology including programming our Cisco 1841 router Implement an offsite backup and disaster recovery plan Test offsite backup plan for efficiency and efficacy Test disaster recovery plan and fine tune the process for efficiency Teach customer support specialists to quickly and effectively solve customer technical issues regarding the companys custom software Build administer and maintain a small office network environment including interfacing with various broadband and online PBX companies Assist both internal and external customers with Windows related troubleshooting Interface with hosting providers to verify safety and security of our external website Configure our VoIP services and troubleshoot any hardware and software issues Implement onsite policies to mitigate potential internal damage caused by employees and guests to the site Regularly troubleshoot on site issues with custom software as well as maintaining databases for said software Conduct a voluntary BSA audit Education AAS in Local Area Network Management Kirkwood Community College Cedar Rapids IA June 2009 to May 2013 Bachelors in Communication Studies University of Iowa Iowa City IA August 2003 to December 2007 Skills Windows Server 9 years Linux 2 years Networking 9 years Active Directory Comptia CertificationsLicenses  A  Network  Security Cisco Certified Entry Networking Technician CCENT Cisco Certified Network Associate CCNA July 2019 to August 2022 Assessments Technical Support Skills Expert March 2019 Measures a candidates ability to apply protocols to identify errors and solutions in order to maintain system function Full results httpsshareindeedassessmentscomshare_assignmentnlp4xiheay4ztxw Indeed Assessments provides skills tests that are not indicative of a license or certification or continued development in any professional field
